name: Cold Call (dojogrant)
description:
In Cold Call, you take on the role of an optimistic new telemarketer hoping to sell your company's latest products to those who truly need them. Unfortunately, once you get started, things are not so wonderful. You keep getting paired up to sell the wrong products to the wrong people, but your boss demands you stay on script. Do you keep pushing the product at the risk of losing all sense of morality and quitting in frustration, or do you sympathize with your unwilling customers and risk getting fired for inefficiency?

Your goal? Make as much cash at the job as you can before either situation happens and you're out the door. Good luck!

To play, just click to advance the text conversation, and then make your choice to go on or off script with your customers. Keep your morale from peaking to the top or dropping to the bottom to stay in the game. Play again for new scenarios and to beat your previous high sales commission!

Programmer: SmallBunny

Art: sc7pher and Lorenzo Pivotto

Writing: williamk9949

Design/Logic, Music/SFX: dojogrant

All art assets, music, and musical SFX are original. Phone/door SFX obtained from https://orangefreesounds.com/ and https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
